inapplicable.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > header:nth-child(1) > div > nav:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > section > nav > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > footer:nth-child(7) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > section > nav > h2:nth-child(1)
